summary: Old college chums get together for a weekend reunion that is bound to open old wounds and perhaps heal them. New romances find a spark while old ones rekindle.
cast: Monica Bell|Carol Schneider|Ellen McLaughlin|Gabriella Messina|Olivia Negron|Stacey Nelkin|Mina Bern|Lynn Cohen|Malindi Fickle|Harvey Fierstein|Joseph Grabarz Jr.|Andrew McCarthy|Robin Romeo|Irma St. Paule|Dreya Weber
title: Everything Relative
